title: A1707 Speakers issue
message:
Hello, I have an 820-00281 board with strage audio issue. 

The right speaker came I for replacement because of randomly loosing the tweet tones.  Replaced with new one and is better but still sounds distorted. 

I replaced U6550 and is almost perfect but still has same distortion. 

Now after 1 minute of playing music both the speakers looses the tweet. What can it be?

title: A1707 Speakers issue
message:
U6450 and U6500 are the tweeter amplifiers.
Check C6450 and C6500.

Headphones sound is correct?

title: A1707 Speakers issue
message:
Headphones sound is correct? yes
C6450 and C6500 i repleced just in case, no differences. 

replaced u6500 no differences. still audio goes lower after 20-30 seconds on both the speakers.

title: A1707 Speakers issue
message: Are you sure only tweeters are affected?

title: A1707 Speakers issue
message:
no at this point. 
i am a bit lost. how can I check what is not working?
